title: Shallow fried popcorn chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole cooked chicken (or other chicken leftovers)', '125g plain flour', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon chilli powder (optional)', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground pepper', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '70ml milk', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons lemon juice']
